Please let me know the name of the company, their rating, and the price for a week-long rental.

Then, I'll identify the one with the highest rating and determine the cost for a week-long rental. I'll start by getting flight information to confirm the details, but most importantly, I need to find car rental companies near LAX.

I don't actually need flight information here, so I'll skip that. Instead, I should focus on finding car rental companies in Los Angeles with electric cars and their ratings.
